experience.title: Experience
experience.openToOpportunities: I am open to new opportunities and projects. Contact me!

position1.title: ROV Vehicle Engineer
position1.description: Construction of underwater equipment and sensors, modernization of ROV vehicles
position1.achievement1: Development of waterproof underwater containers for depths up to 200 meters
position1.technologies: Arduino, Raspberry Pi, CNC, SolidWorks, AutoCAD, Electronics

position2.title: Shipyard Engineer
position2.description: Development of repair elements, transport fixtures, and deck modernization on commercial vessels and military ships
position2.achievement1: Collaboration in a large, multi-departmental team
position2.achievement3: Coordination of orders and construction processes
position2.technologies: SolidWorks, AutoCAD, Inventor, Nastran, FEA, Mechanical Design

position3.title: Design Engineer
position3.description: Work on research projects in underwater robotics. Modernization of hyperbaric chambers. Creation of low and high pressure pneumatic panels
position3.achievement1: Work on an underwater vehicle for collecting physicochemical samples to help locate corpses 'UTOPIEC'
position3.achievement2: Construction of a diving vision system for two divers
position3.achievement3: Work on a research project for a 5-axis underwater manipulator
position3.achievement4: Modernization of FALCON-type military ROV vehicles
position3.achievement5: Construction of a pressure chamber for testing electrical equipment tightness
position3.technologies: ROS2, Python, C++, OpenCV, SolidWorks, Inventor, Electronics, Robotics

position4.achievement2: Building an advertising module in the application
